MS MCQs

    Discover modern workplace solutions with Microsoft 365 and Surface for Business

    »

    1. Which of the following best describes the technology needs of users and IT in today’s modern workforce?

      Users want to maximize the number of apps used daily. IT wants to reduce the vulnerability of device endpoints.

      Users want more options for workplace devices. IT wants a secure but fragmented experience.

      Users want an immersive, unified, and simple experience. IT wants a secure, manageable, and integrated experience.


    2. Microsoft 365 is a complete, intelligent software suite that includes which of the following products?

      Office 365, Windows 7, and Enterprise Mobility and Security (EMS)

      Office 365, Windows 10, and Enterprise Mobility and Security (EMS)

      Office 365, Windows 10, and Surface for Business devices
